items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: length outside off, bowled from close to the stumps, Hetmyer pushes at it and misses, played inside the line
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: short and pulled away towards deep midwicket, comes back for the second as deep square leg fielder cuts it off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: length again and lofted towards long-on this time, doesn't get the power behind it, was cramped for the room but it just evades the backpedalling mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: short of length, angling across, Hetmyer goes for the pull but ends up edging it on to his leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushed towards covers
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: short but way down the leg side, needs to be bowled again
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 wide

items.text: short of length, looks to smash it down the ground, in the air but well short of mid-on this time
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.preText: Tushar: "@Abdullah- that will change as Hetmyer is in the middle "
items.text: fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, once again some extra bounce there, Samuels takes the bottom hand off and dabs it towards point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: back of length on off and middle, extra bounce again, hitting near the splice once more
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, punched towards deep point for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: back of length, angling in from around the wicket, tucked towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: short of length, gives himself some room and cuts it hard, Mehidy makes a good stop at point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, no run

items.preText: Imtiaz Raihan: "79 balls delivery without boundary "
items.text: length ball, angling in after pitching around off, punched towards mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: back of length, again climbing towards the batsman who takes his bottom hand off, an inside edge on to the body, a single as the ball rolls towards the leg side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: length on middle and off, clears his front leg and aims for deep midwicket, finds thin air
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, slices it past the left of the point for a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: short of length, pulled away on the front foot, through mid-on and midwicket, for a couple
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, 2 runs

items.text: finally a boundary, fuller outside off, clears his front leg and looks to clear mid-off, doesn't get the elevation as the fielders gets his finger as he jumps to his right and extends his hand. Enough power though in the shot to reach the boundary
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, FOUR runs

items.preText: Mehidy Hasan comes back, around the wicket
items.text: bowled 'im! Length ball, flatter in trajectory and kept coming in with the angle, kept a little low as well, cramping the batsman for the room who looks to punch it on the back foot, the leg stump is pegged back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, OUT

dismissal.text: SO Hetmyer  b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 6 (13b 0x4 0x6) SR: 46.15

items.preText: Rovman Powell, the stand-in captain, comes in. Samuels and Tamim having a friendly chat at the other end meanwhile
items.text: length on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to R Powell, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, comes forward to defend, a thick outside edge towards short third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to R Powell, no run

items.text: length, on the stumps, worked away towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to R Powell, 1 run

items.preText: sajid: "That's 5 in 5 for Miraz against Hetmyer"
items.text: length, just outside off, comes forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run
